department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Temporary help services for federal government departments
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:**
Regional Master Standing Offer for Temporary Help Services [TJ] (Offre à commandes principale régionale pour des services d'aide temporaire)

**Reference Number:**
WS3976639064-Doc4550479679

**Solicitation Number:**
WS3976639064

**Posting Date:**
2024-04-22

**Closing Date:**
2024-05-08T14:00:00
 expired

**Key Information:**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Contractor:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia (Colombie-Britannique)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Notice Description:**
This tender is for the temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies with the provision of temporary personnel in one or more of the geographical areas as listed in Schedule A of the Statement of Work. This is a request for standing offers as a result of this procurement process, with the resulting contract starting on June 1, 2024, and finishing on May 31, 2025. One contract maybe issued to qualified bidders to provide the temporary help services.

*Government contact information*
Katie Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
elle-la / she-her
katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
